queueRandomHuntSetupCommand.label: Queue Random Hunt Setup Command
queueRandomHuntSetupCommand.tooltip: Name of the queue random hunt setup command

queueGetNextHuntCommand.label: Next Hunt From Queue Command
queueGetNextHuntCommand.tooltip: Name of the command to get the next hunt from the queue

currentHuntCommand.label: Current Hunt Command
currentHuntCommand.tooltip: Name of the command to get the current hunt

huntSetupCommand.label: Hunt Setup Roll Command
huntSetupCommand.tooltip: Name of the hunt setup roll command

weaponCommand.label: Weapon Roll Command
weaponCommand.tooltip: Name of the weapon roll command

monsterCommand.label: Monster Roll Command
monsterCommand.tooltip: Name of the monster roll command

huntQueueSize.label: Hunt Queue Size
huntQueueSize.tooltip: Max number of hunts allowed in queue

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

onCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on cooldown for $cd minutes!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

onUserCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on user cooldown for $cd minutes!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name
